The goal of Devariation is to ...

## Installation

You can install the development version of Devariation like so:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("RuyiPan/Devariation")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(Devariation)

set.seed(1)
X <- matrix(rnorm(100 * 80), 100, 80)
Y <- matrix(rnorm(100 * 60), 100, 60)
out <- drv(X, Y)
out$drvRes
out$drvRes$p.value #check p-value
```
